questions: How can we ensure the sustainability of development in our country ? Suggest any one  way.
answers: Introduction of organic farming.  Adopting measures to reduce global warming and implement global limits on carbon emission.   1

questions: “There is enough for everybody’s need but not for everybody’s greed. “ Who said these words ?
State any one reason for over use of resources ?   Why ground water is over used?
answers: Any one reason for the overuse of resources can be :  over population.  lack of awareness.  excessive use of tubewells, canals etc for irrigation.  industrial need.   1
